prompt:
Create a U-channel bracket using explicit coordinates on the Top plane (XY) and extrude thickness/height along +Z.

Geometry: base plate 120 mm (X: -60..60) x 40 mm (Y: -20..20) x 4 mm thick -> extrude 4 mm (NEW).
Two side walls: each wall footprint is 120 mm long (X: -60..60) and 4 mm thick in Y. Place one at Y: 16..20, the other at Y: -20..-16. Extrude each wall 20 mm high with operation ADD so it merges with the base.

Holes: diameter 6 mm. Base holes at (x=-30 mm,y=0) and (x=30 mm,y=0). Wall holes: on each wall add two holes at x=-20 mm and x=20 mm centered in the wall thickness (y=18 or y=-18) and around mid-height; use separate hole sketches on Top plane and REMOVE THROUGH_ALL (approx is fine).

Validate with onshape_snapshot_partstudio; bbox should be about x~120mm, y~40mm, z~20mm.
